TwentyFour.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    TwentyFour.DEFAULT_GOAL — Constant.

    The default goal of a Twenty Four problem is 24.

    TwentyFour.OPS
    TwentyFour.OP_SYMS
    TwentyFour.TwentyFour
    TwentyFour.XXIV — Type.

    XXIV is an instance of a Twenty Four problem.

    TwentyFour.eval
    TwentyFour.get_goal — Function.

    get_goal(X::XXIV) returns the targe goal of this instance of a Twenty Four problem. This is typically 24.

    TwentyFour.include
    TwentyFour.set_goal — Function.

    set_goal(X::XXIV, g) sets the goal of this Twenty Four problem to g. Default g is 24.

    TwentyFour.solve — Function.

    solve(nums...) solves a Twenty-Four puzzle for the given numbers. Returns a String giving the solution. Example:

    julia> solve(4,2,5,1)
"(4+2)*(5-1)"
    TwentyFour.solver
    TwentyFour.str — Function.

    str(x::Rational{Int}) returns a nice string form of x.
